item.title: Waymo plans to launch a robotaxi service in London in 2026
item.description: Waymo already has ties to the UK, which began after the autonomous vehicle technology company acquired Latent Logic in 2019.

item.title: OpenAI has five years to turn $13 billion into $1 trillion
item.description: Some of America's most valuable companies are now leaning on OpenAI to fulfill major contracts, notes the FT.

item.title: Coinbase boosts investment in India’s CoinDCX, valuing exchange at $2.45B
item.description: Coinbase's latest investment lifts CoinDCX's valuation from $2.15 billion to $2.45 billion.

item.title: EVs take a backseat in Stellantis’ $13B US investment plan
item.description: Five new vehicles and a four-cylinder engine will be developed and produced through 2029 as part of investment into factories in Illinois, Ohio, Michi...

item.title: Sam Altman says ChatGPT will soon allow erotica for adult users
item.description: OpenAI says it will soon roll back some of ChatGPT's safeguards, and even allow the chatbot to engage in erotica for adult users.
